greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Analog of A113869 for three generators.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
John D. Dixon, Asymptotics of Generating the Symmetric and Alternating Groups, Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, Item R56 of Volume 12(1), 2005.
mathematica: nmax=30; A113871 = Rest[CoefficientList[Series[1/Sum[(k!)^2 x^k,{k,0,nmax}],{x,0,nmax}],x]]; Table[SeriesCoefficient[1 + Sum[A113871[[j]]/Product[n-i+1,{i,1,j}]^2,{j,1,nmax}],{n,Infinity,k}],{k,0,nmax}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 28 2015 *)
xref: Related to A113871 in the same way that A113869 is related to A003319.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 01 2006
ext: Missing a(3)=0 and more terms added by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 28 2015
